rules.description: Severity equal high AND Fixable since 30 days
Severity greater than or equal high AND Network attack vector AND Fixable
Forbid sensitive information and secrets in the image metadata
Forbid the use of discouraged instructions

failures.remediation: Forbidden instruction ADD found. Remove ADD from image creation file.

Modify your image configuration and set the default user to other than root
Check the documentation to learn why and how to change the default image user

rules.description: Severity greater than or equal critical
Forbid sensitive information and secrets in the image metadata
